name: The Democratic Society
goal: The Democratic Society works for more and better democracy, where people and institutions have the desire, opportunity and confidence to participate together. We work to create opportunities for people to become involved in the decisions that affect their lives and for them to have the skills to do this effectively. We support governments, parliaments and any organisation that wants to involve citizens in decision making to be transparent, open and welcoming of participation. We actively support spaces, places and processes to make this happen.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Culture, Education, General and Institutional Affairs, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: European Citizens Initiative, Open Government, Democratic promotion and citizenship, European elections, democracy transparency, efficient administration.
